13.title: Activate after Payment
13.description:
Activate user's account only if payment received in admin account.

Features :

  • Once the payment is received in admin account, user will receive an activation link through email.
  • Accounts will be activated automatically after clicking the activation link.
  • Captcha can also be shown with registration form.

Working :

  • Install it and configure plugin.
  • Now, in PayPlans-> Configuration, set "Registration Integration" to "Activate after payment".
  • Now, customer's can register at your site.
  • An activation link will be sent to user after payment completion. When user will click this link, account will become active.
13.teaser: Activate user's account only if user's payment is received.

40.title: Content Hider
40.description:
Content Hider app provide facility to hide selected content of article from subscribers/unsubscribers according to plan.

Features :

  • Content Hider app allow admin to show/hide content of article.
  • This app can be applied on any plan in any part of article.
  • Default contents of articles will be shown on subscribing any plan.

Working :

  • Admin needs to install app and configure plugin.
  • Now, open the article on which you want to apply the restrictions for subscribed/non-subscribed users.
  • Starting from the content which you want to hide/show, apply {payplans} as start tag and {/payplans} as end tag.
  • Content Hider tag "{payplans plan_id=1,2, or more SHOW/HIDE}CONTENT TO BE SHOWN/HIDDEN.{/payplans}".
40.teaser: A plugin to hide article's selected contents from unsubscribed users. Also, you can specify the plans whose subscription will show the hidden content to the customers.

41.title: Content Seller
41.description:
Content Seller app used to sell article without setting up multiple apps for multiple plans into PayPlans.

Features :

  • Article can be sell using one plan and with different price and time variations.
  • Articles contents can be in various formats like : Video, Image, Text and Audio.
  • Content Seller app will be very helpful when large amount of articles needs to be sold.

Working :

  • Admin needs to install app and configure plugin.
  • Now, open the article you want to sell and add these two tags :
    • (1). {pp-contentseller-subscribe}CONTENT TO BE SUBSCRIBED.{/pp-contentseller-subscribe}
    (2). {pp-contentseller-restrict}CONTENT TO BE RESTRICTED.{/pp-contentseller-restrict}
41.teaser: Content Seller can be used to sell individual article without setting up multiple plans and apps into PayPlans.
41.metadata: {"title":"Payplans Content Seller App","description":"Content Seller can be used to sell individual article without setting up multiple plans and apps.","keywords":"'sell single article', 'sell article online', 'use without creating multiple plans', 'payplans app'","robots":"","author":""}

43.title: Default Plan
43.description:
This plugin assigns a default plan to the user whenever a new user registers to a PayPlan-enabled site.

Features :

  • If you have disabled payplans registration plugin and if you want to assign a common plan on registration then it can be achieved with Default Plan plugin.So whenever a new user Sign Up on your website, then a default plan will be assigned.
  • If you have enabled payplans registration plugin, then using this app would assign a default plan to the users along with the subscribed plan.

Working :

  • Install the app.
  • To configure click on PayPlans-SignupPlan plug-in in Plugin-Manager.
  • Set Sign-Up Plan by selecting any plan that you want to set as default plan for SignupPlan App.
  • When the user will sign up at the site then a default plan will be assigned to it.

Note:

  • You cannot create multiple instances of Default Plan App i.e. you can assign only one default plan to users.
  • You cannot assign default plan according to profile types. Eg. If you have installed JSPT and there are two profiles types-students and teachers then you cannot create two default plans for it.You can only create one Default Plan which will be common to both.
43.teaser: Default Plan plugin assigns a default plan to the user whenever a new user registers to a PayPlan-enabled site.

55.title: EU-VAT
55.description:
This app allows you to calculate personal and business taxes as per European Union value added tax (or EU VAT) system.

A value added tax (VAT) is a consumption tax added to a product's sales price. It represents a tax on the "value added" to the product throughout its production process.

Features :

  • VAT is levied on both the producer and consumer while a sales tax is levied on only the end consumer. VAT is applied at the various stages of production while sales tax is applied on the total value of the purchase.
  • VAT is charged when a VAT-registered business sells to either another business or to a non-business customer.
  • When VAT-registered businesses buy goods or services they can generally reclaim the VAT they've paid.
  • Option to Set "All" Countries during configuration of an App.
  • Categories different personal and Business Tax Rate on the basis of Subscribed Plans and Buyer's Countries in App.
  • Verified entered vat id is valid or not. If not then Personal Tax rate will get applied.
  • VAT is levied on both the producer and consumer while a sales tax is levied on only the end consumer.

Working :

  • Eu Vat is considered as Payplans core app. Need to Install it from App store.
  • Euvat and Basic Tax app won't work simultaneously. Recommended to use only one at a time.
  • Enter input tax rate in percentage (%) as personal and business tax rates.
  • Set verification of Vat Id to Yes if required.

56.title: Event List
56.description:
EventList is a easy way to manage and present your Events. It offers features like Venue database, Picture resizing and it also has some features for site visitors like a simple registration system, map service links, or the submission of new events and venues from the front-end as well as front-end editing.

Features :

57.title: eWay
57.description:
Accept credit cards on your website with the Australian payment gateway.

Features :

  • Support Fixed, Recurring, Paid Trial and Recurring plans payments.
  • It doesn't support Free trial and recurring plans(Only paid trials are supported).
  • No redirection of site, Accept credit cards on your site.
  • Supported PCI-Compliant Gateway and SSL Certifications
  • Refund of payments from Backend
  • Support payments only for Australia, New Zealand, United Kingdom countries
  • Minimum recurring supporting time duration is 1 day
  • Provide Sandbox/ Test Account only for Partners. Minimum payment of 10$ for testing purpose.

Working :

  • It's a core app, Install it from App store.
  • Enter credentials provided by Eway Team ie customer Id, Username and password.
  • Option to set cancellation of recurring from site.
57.teaser: Accept credit cards on your website with the Australian payment gateway.

58.title: Export
58.description:
Export App integrated with PayPlans to provide facility of exporting payplans important data in any other analysing aplication.

Features :

  • Export app used to export PayPlans data in widely acceptable format '.csv' file.
  • Export app allow to export PayPlans data in combination of : (1) Invoice (2) Subscription (3) User.
  • Export app provide the filtering of exportable data by (1) Plan (2)Invoice/Subscription Status (3) To/From Date.
  • Export app allow to export the payplans data by making required selection in easier and better way.

Working :

  • Admin needs to install Export app. No need to create app instance and configure app.
  • After installation Export app list under PayPlans tab-menu named 'Reports' in backend.
  • After required data selection, admin can easily export the PayPlans data.
58.teaser: Now, Payplans is provided with facility of exporting payplans subscription and invoicing data that can be use in any other analysing software and for many accounting software.
58.metadata: {"title":"PayPlans | Export App","description":"Using export app users can export payplans subscription and invoicing data that can be use in any other analysing software and for many accounting software.","keywords":"'export data of payplans', 'subscription export', 'export users and invoices', 'filter according to plans, status'","robots":"","author":""}

59.title: Fixed Date Expiration
59.description:
Fixed-date-expiration app integrated with PayPlans, provide the functionality to expire subscriptions according to plan.

Features :

  • Fixed-date-expiration app all the future subscriptions can be ended on a specific date.
  • Fixed-date-expiration app applicable for fixed plan only.
  • Fixed-date-expiration app allows you to provide subscription till a specific calendar date not according to plan expiration time.
  • Fixed-date-expiration app will not work with recurring plans. If you apply on recurring plan then it will convert it in to fixed plan.

Working :

  • Admin needs to install app and create it's app instance and fill necessary details.
  • All new subscription will be expired on the desired date set in the app parameters.
  • Mention the subscription date range, for which you want to apply this app, for expiration of selective subscriptions.
  • Admin can set Extend Subscription to Yes/No to Allow/Deny subscription extension.
  • App display plan expiration time on front-end Subscription page as per applied on plan.
59.teaser: Fixed-date-expiration app allows you to provide subscription till a specific calendar date not according to plan expiration time.
59.metadata: {"title":"Fixed Date Expiration App for Membership Websites","description":"","keywords":"specific calendar year, expire subscription, fixed expiration","robots":"","author":""}

61.title: G-Analytics
61.description:
G-Analytics app integrated with PayPlans to provide tracking to analyze purchage in E-commerce business.

Features :

  • G-Analytics app provide integartion of PayPlans and Google Analytics to convert visitors into customers.
  • G-Analytics app used to track purchase on the basis of plan subscription.
  • G-Analytics app used to identify the most popular and demanding plan.

Working :

  • Admin needs to install app and create it's app instance and fill necessary details.
  • Admin needs to register at Google Analytics to get Google Tracking-ID to apply tracking on website(domain).
  • No need to place JavaScript tracking code anywhere in PayPlans provided by Google Analytics.
  • Admin can track purchage statistics of different plan according to time : Daily/Weekly/Monthly.
61.teaser: Want to convert visitors into customers ? If this is your state of mind then payplans is here to provide integartion with G-Analytics. Now Monitor your live site with real environment.
61.metadata: {"title":"G-Analytics","description":"Want to convert visitors into customers ? If this is your state of mind then payplans is here to provide integartion with G-Analytics. Now Monitor your live site with real environment.","keywords":"payplans,membership,joomla,subscription,software,G-Analytics","robots":"","author":""}

62.title: Gate2shop
62.description:
Gate2Shop app integrated with PayPlans to provide a secure e-commerce solution for small/mid-size business.

Features :

  • Gate2Shop payment gateway app supports payment for : (1)Fixed Plan, (2)Reccuring Plan, (3) 1 Trial + Reccuring Plan.
  • Supported Currency : AUD, CAD, CHF, DKK, EUR, GBP, NOK, SEK, USD.
  • Supported Card : Credit/Debit Cards( VISA, VISA Electron, MasterCard, Maestro, American Express, Diners Club, JCB, etc).
  • Notification Time : Instant.

Working :

  • Admin needs to install app and create it's app instance and fill necessary details.
  • At Gate2Shop account, term 'rebilling' is used for 'reccuring'.
  • To apply Gate2Shop app for reccuring plans, admin needs to add plan for reccuring payment in Gate2Shop account and get Plan-ID and Templete-ID to fill in app configuration.
  • For payment processing, user will get redirected to payment gateway's site and after payment completion user will redirected back to merchant's site.
62.teaser: G2S provides a secure online e-commerce solution for small to mid-sized businesses. Whether your goal is to sell software online, monetize games, or distribute other digital goods, Gate2Shop has the skills, tools, technology, and expertise to help you. Software vendors and digital service providers can use a secure and reliable platform to succeed in their online endeavors. This app integrate Gate2Shop with payplans, supports for fixed recurring as well as Recurring and Recurring+trial_1 payments.
62.metadata: {"title":"PayPlans | Alipay Payment Gateway","description":"PayPlans is now integrated with gate2shop payment gateway. Gate2shop handles fixed payment gateways.","keywords":"'payplans integration with gate2shop', 'online payment solution', 'open source method'","robots":"","author":""}

63.title: http Query
63.description:
HTTP Query app integrated with PayPlans to send out HTTP request on the basis of Plan and Subscription status.

Features :

  • HTTP Query app sends variable along with specified URL.
  • It sends data by GET method.
  • Its purpose is to sends data in background as per admin needs on the basis of subscribed plan and subscription status.
  • User is not aware about on what URL and what data sended on http request.

Working :

  • Admin needs to install app and create it's app instance and fill necessary details.
  • Admin can specify different URL and varibales for each subscription status : Active/Hold/Expire.
  • HTTP Query app sends the data on specified URL using CURL request.
63.teaser: The HTTP Query app sends out HTTP request to URL on the basis of the subscription status of the plan subscribed by the user.
63.metadata: {"title":"http Query","description":"App sends out HTTP request to URL on the basis of the subscription status of the plan subscribed by the user.","keywords":"Payplans,subsription,system,software,membership,Paygate,payment,http query","robots":"","author":""}

67.title: Invitex
67.description:
This app provides integration between Invitex invitation component and PayPlans.

Features :

  • Admin can set Invitation limits for user according to plans.
  • Send Discount code through mail’s automatically
    • When user send invitations.
    • when invitations are accepted.
    • when user registered through an invitation.
  • Invitex component itself provides two important features:
    • Send invitation during registration.To enable this go to invitex component->Config->Registration Specific->Set Invitation As a part of Registration to "yes".
    • Only those users can register who has received the invitation.To enable this go to invitex component. Config->Registration Specific->Set Registration only on Invitation to "yes".

Note : We have made some changes in the latest version of app. Please refer document for further details.
67.teaser: Invitex app provides, functionality to restrict users to  send limited invitations according to plan subscribed.
67.metadata: {"title":"PayPlans: Invitex app","description":"Invitex app provides, functionality to restrict users to  send limited invitations according to plan subscribed.","keywords":"'integrate invitex with payplans', 'complete open source app', 'send limited number of invitations'","robots":"","author":""}

68.title: JDownloads
68.description:
jDownloads allow download access on the basis of Joomla User Group. PayPlans is integrated with jDownloads using Joomla User Type App. This app assign the Joomla user group to user on the basis of user's subscription status. So, PayPlans is natively integrated with jDownlaods.

NOTE : PayPlans can be integrated with latest version of JDownloads-3.2v using Joomla User Type App
68.teaser: The JDownloads app provides integration of JDownloads with PayPlans.

69.title: JEvents

JEvents is a well known Events Calendar for Joomla.You can categorize Events and customize calendar views to show all or some of these categories.It's free & compatible with Joomla 1.5 and further versions.

With JEvents App, you can give different rights to users along with JEvents Categories access as per their subscription plan.
69.teaser: Our Jevent plugin provides integration of JEvents with PayPlans.

71.title: JFB Connect
71.description: Admin can use this integration to let the user registering at his site using JFBConnect to first select the subscription plan and then proceed with the normal JFBConnect Registration process. If the plugin is enable, then it will redirect users to plan selection page when they attempt to register and will not let them to register untill they selects a plan. If plan selection is not required for registration, then you can disable this plugin. It won't force user to select the plan while registering on the site.

71.metadata: {"title":"JFB Connect","description":"JFBConnect Registration plugin integrates JFBConnect registration with PayPlans.","keywords":"payplans,subscription,management,software,membership,joomla","robots":"","author":""}

73.title: Jnews
73.description:
This app provides integration between jNews component and PayPlans.

Features :

  • This app assigns the mailing list of jNews to the users automatically according to subscribed plan.

Working :

  • Install the Jnews component. Create mailing list and assign newsletter to these list.
  • Install jNews app and create app instance.
  • Specify the mailing list which the user should be assigned to according to the subscribed plan.
  • Create Dashboard Widget for this app and show the user the mailing list in which he/she has access to.
  • When users subscribe the plan and they will be assigned the mailing list according to their subscription.

74.title: JomSocial MultiProfile Types
74.description:
This app provides integration between Jomsocial component and PayPlans.

Features :

  • This app assigns JomSocial multiprofile to user depending upon the plan he/she subscribes.
  • Admin can configure which multiprofile to assign on which plan subscription and subscription status.
  • Admin can configure this app to force users to subscribe plan on changing their multiprofile.

Working :

  • Install the Jomsocial component.Create jomsocial multiprofiles.
  • This app is pre-installed in previous versions of Payplans, from Payplans 3.3 you need to install it from App store.
  • Create Jomsocial Multiprofile app instance.
  • Specify the profile types which the user should be assigned according to subscribed plan.
  • Set "Redirect user to Subscribe Page on Profile Type change" to "yes" if you want to force users to subscribe plan on changing their multiprofile or else set it to "no".
  • When users subscribe the plan and they will be assigned the profile types according to their subscription.
74.teaser: This app integrates Jomsocial component with payplans.
74.metadata: {"title":"Jom Social Multi-Profile Types","description":"This plugins ask customer to pay for having premium profile types in JomSocial community. ","keywords":"payplans,membership,joomla,subscription,software","robots":"","author":""}

75.title: Jomsocial Registration
75.description:
JomSocial Registration plugin integrates JomSocial registration with PayPlans.

Features :

  • Admin can use this plugin to let the user registering at his site to first select the subscription plan and then proceed with the normal JomSocial Registration process.
  • If the plugin is enable, then it will redirect users to plan selection page when they attempt to register and will not let them to register until they selects a plan.
  • If plan selection is not required for registration, then you can disable this plugin. It will not force user to select the plan while registering on the site.

Working :

  • Install jomsocial component.
  • Install Jomsocial Registration Plugin.
  • Go to Payplans->Congiguration and set "Registration Integration" to JomSocial.
  • Whenever users tries to register at the site then they will be redirected to plan selection page and they will not be allowed to register until they select a plan.
75.teaser: JomSocial Registration plugin integrates JomSocial registration with PayPlans.

77.title: Joomla Registration
77.description:
Joomla Registration plugin integrates Joomla registration with PayPlans.

Features :

  • Admin can use this plugin to let the user registering at his site to first select the subscription plan and then proceed with the normal Joomla Registration process.
  • If the plugin is enable, then it will redirect users to plan selection page when they attempt to register and will not let them to register until they selects a plan.
  • If plan selection is not required for registration, then you can disable this plugin. It will not force user to select the plan while registering on the site.

Working :

  • This plugin is already installed with payplans, you are not required to install this plugin. Go to plugin manager and enable the plugin "PayPlans-Registration-Joomla".
  • Go to Payplans->Congiguration and set "Registration Integration" to Joomla.
  • Whenever users tries to register at the site then they will be redirected to plan selection page and they will not be allowed to register until they select a plan.
77.teaser: Joomla Registration plugin integrates Joomla registration with PayPlans.
77.metadata: {"title":"Joomla Registration","description":"Joomla Registration plugin integrates Joomla registration with PayPlans.","keywords":"payplans,subscription,management,software,membership,joomla","robots":"","author":""}

81.metadata: {"title":"PayPlans : Juser Type","description":"With the help of payplans juser type app you can assign Joomla User Type according to customers' subscription status.","keywords":"Juser Type,payplans,membership,joomla,subscription,software,Joomla User Type","robots":"","author":""}

85.title: KISSmetrics
85.description:
This app facilitates administrator to track ECommerce events with KissMetrics.

  • Tracks Events of PayPlans. 
  • Notification of tracking recorded by KissMetrics with some information, related to the event like what happened and who did that activity. 

Requirements: To setup this app and run correctly following are must.

  • Kissmetrics account.
  • Proper site settings for KissMetrics account. 
  • API Key of site to track. 

 Events can track: This App able to Track following Event.

  • Visit of Login Page.
  • Visit of Pricing Page. 
  • Add To Cart (When user selects a plan to subscribe). 
  • Invoice Checkout. 
  • Subscription Status Change. 
  • Upgradation of a Subscription. 
  • Order Cancellation. 
  • Subscription Renewal. 
  • Payment Recieved.

85.metadata: {"title":"kissmerics integration with PayPlans","description":"You can track the events of payplans and notification of tracking records with kissmetrics.","keywords":"'kissmetrics API with payplans', 'track ecommerce events', 'payplans notification', 'tracking records with membership website', 'payplans integration'","robots":"","author":""}

87.title: Kunena Forum
87.description:
Kunena forum app integrated with PayPlans and Kunena, provides access to Kunena categories according to subscribed plan.

Features :

  • Using app admin can manage access of Kunena Categories.
  • Admin can apply access restriction of type : None/Overview/ReadOnly/ReplyOnly, on Kunena categories for non subscribers.

Working :

  • Admin needs to install app and create it's app instance and fill necessary details.

89.title: Language Pack (en)
89.description:
Language packs provides flexibility for updating language files.
Example:-

  • Suppose there are three versions of payplans X.1, X.2, X.3.
  • An App ‘Y’ developed by payplans team after releasing the version X.3, which is compatible with X.1 and X.2 and X.3.
  • A customer using X.1 version and installed ‘Y’ app. But, at this time that customer faces a problem of untranslated strings and must have to upgrade the version of PayPlans.

Now we are providing language packs and due to this you do not need to upgrade whole PayPlans for untranslated language strings.

You just have to Install/Upgrade the language pack.
89.teaser: Language packs provides the flexibility for updating language files of PayPlans.
89.metadata: {"title":"PayPlans: Language pack","description":"With the help of PayPlans language plugin, users can update their language pack easily.","keywords":"'payplans language plugin','update language pack','joomla language file'","robots":"","author":""}

94.title: Limit Subscription
94.description:
Limit Subscription app integrated with PayPlans, allows to limit on the number of plans subscribed and subscription status.

Features :

  • Limit Subscription app allows to limit subscriptions on the basis of number and subscription status.
  • Using this app admin can limit subscriptions on any status like- Active/Hold/Expire/No-Status.

Working :

  • Admin needs to install app and create it's app instance and fill necessary details.
  • Admin can apply limitation on any specific plan or on all plans.
  • After subscription limit it shows message that maximum allowed count reached.
94.teaser: If you want that, user should not be able to subscribe same plan(s) again and again then this is the best way to stop them.
94.metadata: {"title":"Limit Subscription","description":"This app allows you to limit the number of times, a same plan can be purchased.","keywords":"Free, Subscription, Limit, Payplans, Membership Site","robots":"","author":""}

95.title: MailChimp
95.description:
MailChimp helps you to design email newsletters, share them on social network, integrate with services you already use, and track your results.

  • In this you can subscribe user to a MailChimp List on the basis of the Subscription Status.
  • You have to enter API Key of your account at MailChimp in the app and it will automatically imports all list s from your account.  Then you can subscribe user to these lists on the basis of their subscription status.
95.teaser: Our MailChimp Plugin provides integration of MailChimp with PayPlans.

96.title: Mailster Newsletter
96.description:
This App provides integration with this component. By using this app you can assign users to one or more Mailster Group(s) on the basis of the Subscription Status.   

How it works:

  • For this you have to setup Mailbox and Sender setting of Mailster.
  • Create Instance of Mailster Newsletter app.
  • Select Mailster Groups in “Add to Mailster Group” field of Mailster Newsletter app.
  • Then subscribers assigned/removed from these Groups on the basis of their subscription status and Newsletters will sent by Mailster.
96.teaser: Mailster is Newsletter component which allows you to create Lists, Groups and sends Newsletters to subscribers of these groups.

97.title: Menu Access
97.description:
Menu Access app integrated with PayPlans to control display of menus according to subscribed plan.

Features :

  • Menu Access app show/hide menus according to plan attached with the app with access control.
  • Menus on which admin want ot apply access control, select required menus among all listed.
  • One or more than one menus can be selected to apply menu access control.

Working :

  • Admin needs to install app and create it's app instance and fill necessary details.
  • When admin select to show the menus then menu will be visible to user but not accessible.
  • When admin select to hide the menus then menu will not be visible and accessible to user.
  • If any menu is not restricted by menu access app then it will work as default behavior.

Note : From Joomla 3.4 Menu access app will not work with multilingual, due to major changes in J3.4 core. It's not possible to override menus (Show/Hide Menu functionality) using Menu-Access plugin. If your site is not multilingual then Please disable Language filter Plugin if enabled .
97.teaser: Menu Access app controls display of menus according to plan subscribed by a user.
97.metadata: {"title":"Menu Access","description":"Menu Access app controls display of menus according to plan subscribed by a user.","keywords":"payplans,subsription,membership,software","robots":"","author":""}

98.title: Module Access
98.description:
Module Access app integrated with PayPlans to control the access of modules according to plan subscription.

Features :

  • Module Access app is best suited to customize module rendering to user.
  • Using app admin can take decesion to Allow/NotAllow module rendering on basis of subscription.
  • To apply access control on modules admin select the required modules among available modules.

Working :

  • Admin needs to install app and create it's app instance and fill necessary details.
  • The selected modules will render to user after subscribing attached plan.
  • If user not subscribed the plan associated with module then module will not render to user.
  • If any module is not restricted by module access app then it will work as default behavior.
98.teaser: Module Access app controls display of modules according to plan subscribed by a user.
98.metadata: {"title":"Module Access","description":"Module Access app controls display of modules according to plan subscribed by a user.","keywords":"payplans,subscription,software,managment,module access","robots":"","author":""}

99.title: MoneyBookers
99.description:
Moneybookers is an online payment solution that enables any type of online business on the Internet to securely and cost effectively send and receive payment transactions. Moneybookers is a truly global online payment solution that is ideally suited to online businesses, online merchants and ecommerce stores.

What we support :

  • Fixed amount Payment
  • Recurring Subscription

How it works :

  • Admin user is required to make an App in Payplans Admin Panel and fill the correct information in App Parameters.
  • When customer makes the payment, he/she will be redirected to MoneyBooker's Site.
  • There he/she can pay through his/her MoneyBooker account, bank account or by using credit/debit card.
99.teaser: This app allows you to accept payments via MoneyBookers.
99.metadata: {"title":"MoneyBookers","description":"This app allows you to accept payments via MoneyBookers.","keywords":"pay,subscription,plans,payplan,management,admin play,MoneyBookers","robots":"","author":""}

100.title: Moset Tree
100.description:
Mosets Tree app provides integration of Mosets Tree component with PayPlans. Mosets Tree is a directory component for Joomla.

Features :

  • Mosets Tree app allows to control the number of listings a user can submit as per their subscription plan.
  • It allows to limit total listing submissions as well as featured listing submissions.
  • It allows to limit listing submissions on all categories or on any specific category.

Working :

  • Install the component Mosets Tree. Now, Install the Mosets Tree app and create app instance.
  • In Mosets Tree component Configuration settings set 'Adding new listing requires approval' to NO.
  • To limit submission of listings, set any specific category or all categories for the subscribed plan.
  • Set listing submission limit for total listing submissions and featured listing submissions.
  • Create a dashboard widget for Mosets Tree app, so that user can see the submitted listings.
  • When users subscribe the plan,they will be assigned to submit listing according to their subscription.
100.teaser: Mtree Plugin provides integration of Mosets Tree with PayPlans.

101.title: Multi Login Restriction
101.description:
If you don’t want the same account to be accessed from anywhere at the same time then this plugin will be helpful for you. Only 1 active session of a user account will exist at a time.

This plugin facilitates:

  • To restrict multiple-logins of same user account at a time.
  • To maintain violation counter of user accounts and notify the actual owner about his ccount violation, time-to-time.
  • To check violation on payplans dashboard
101.teaser: Multi-Login-Restriction forbid login access of one user account from different computers/browsers at the same time.

MySQL query app can be used to fire various queries in MySQL. Different features embedded in it are as follows:

104.title: Ninjaboard
104.description:
Ninjaboard marks a new generation in native Joomla forums, it is one of the easiest to use, yet most powerful forums and without a doubt the best looking one.Totally new codebase takes advantage of modern coding practices for less bugs, higher security, and best of all greater ease of use.

What we support :

107.title: Ogone
107.description:
The company delivers fully integrated solutions for managing electronic payments in several domains including e-commerce.

This app can be used for following plan types:

  • Fixed
  • Recurring
  • Recurring + Trial 1
107.teaser: The App provide integration with Ogone payment service, which is one of the leading European Payment Service Providers with more than 33.000 clients across 45 countries.
107.metadata: {"title":"Ogone Payment Gateway integration with PayPlans","description":"Payplans now provide the integration with Ogone, which is One of the leading European Payment Service Providers.","keywords":"'payplans with ogone payment services', 'ogone payment gateway with payplans'","robots":"","author":""}

108.title: One Click Checkout
108.description:
One-click-checkout is a plugin, which make it possible to subscribe any plan just by single click. It skips login/register screen and directly redirect the subscribers to checkout page, from where itself, login/registration will be done.

How it works:

  1. Before using one-click-checkout, you must enable ‘Payplans-Registration-Quick’ plugin.

  2. When subscriber select any plan, a single screen i.e. invoice-confirm will be displayed with options to fill the registration details as well as checkout option.
    On  the same screen, an option for login is also available for registered users.

  3. Clicking on checkout will attach the invoice to the new users, as well as register them to your site also.
108.teaser: One-click-checkout is a plugin, which make it possible to subscribe any plan just by single click.
108.metadata: {"title":"One Click Checkout App for Membership Websites","description":"","keywords":"One-click checkout, Single-click checkout, direct checkout","robots":"","author":""}

109.title: PagSeguro
109.description:
Pagseguro is a Brazilian payment gateway largely used in Brazil. It allows to shop securely without disclosing your credit card information. You can choose between 13 payment methods, including credit cards and Brazilian banks. Pagseguro accepts credit cards and bank transfers quickly and easily.

Pagseguro supports one time payment only, it does not support recurring subscription.
109.teaser: Payplans integration with PagSeguro Payment Gateway allows you to accept payments via PagSeguro, the leading Brazilian provider of online payments.

110.title: Parent Child
110.description:
This App supports Parent-Child Relationship in plan subscription. If parent plan is not subscribed then its dependent child plans will also not work. This App provides you an option to create dependent plan(s). A parent plan can have several dependent child plans. This hierarchy of plans can be extended upto user’s requirements.User will not able to see child plans if he/she is not subscribed to parent plan. Just by enabling this app, you can have more options at create plan page.

Possible Cases:-

  1. In plan relationship parameter, if you select “Any of the above” at the time of creating plan, then user will be able to see all child plans by subscribing any parent plan on which the child plan depends.

  2. If you select “All of the above”, then user will not be able to see child plans until he/she will subscribe all parent plans on which child plan depends.

  3. If you select “None of the above”, then all the child plans will be visible to the user but after subscribing any child plan, user will not able to see parent plan.

How it works:-

  • This is a core app. So, no need to install it. Just enable Payplans-ParentChild Plugin.
  • Create a plan, you can see option of “plan depends on”, set the parameters.
110.teaser: This App supports Parent-Child Relationship in plan subscription. If parent plan is not subscribed then its dependent child plans will also not work.
110.metadata: {"title":"Parent Child App for Membership Websites","description":"","keywords":"Parent-Child Relationship, Plans, Subscription","robots":"","author":""}

111.title: paxum
111.description:
Paxum Inc. is not a banking institution but it offer most of the services that your bank might do plus many more as an e-wallet system. As a business owner your daily operations might include paying numerous customers, affiliates or vendors. As a Paxum business account holder, you can save a lot of time, headaches and money by using our e-wallet system for all your financial needs.You can instantly issue Paxum personal accounts to your customers or affiliates and pay them by transferring money from your Paxum business current account to theirs. The money is available right away in their e-wallet account. This is the fastest and most cost effective method to pay people nowadays.

What we support:

  1. Fixed
  2. Recurring
111.teaser: Paxum offers a secure ewallet payment service that lets users pay merchants by transferring funds from banks.
111.metadata: {"title":"PayPlans is Provide the Integration with Paxum Payment Gateway","description":"PayPlans now integrated with Paxum payment gateway which offers a secure ewallet payment service that lets users pay merchants by transferring funds from banks.","keywords":"'payplans paxum', 'paxum with paypalns', 'open source software', 'interation'","robots":"","author":""}

112.title: Pay By Wallet
112.description:
Wallet system has been introduced from Payplans 2.x. Users can recharge their wallet and later on they can purchase items using this payment gateway, which will consume the wallet balance for the purchase.

How it works?

  • Admin user is required to make an App in Payplans Admin Panel and fill the App Parameters.
  • When customer selects PayByWallet at invoice confirmation, he/she will be redirected to another screen, where he/she has to confirm the payment.
  • There he/she can pay through his/her wallet balance.

Prerequisites : In Payplans configuration,

  • Set Utilize Wallet for Payment to Yes, for allowing PayByWallet to be used for normal payments
  • Set Utilize Wallet for Recurring Payment to Yes, for recurring payments.
  • And for allowing wallet recharge, set Wallet Recharge Allowed to Yes.
112.teaser: PayByWallet app allow users to pay from their balance exist in wallet. It’s different from the other payment methods.

113.title: Pay With Points
113.description:
If you want to sell your site’s membership with Alpha user points or Jomsocial Karma Points then this app facilitates you to set up this scenario easily.

How it works :

  • Admin user is required to make an App in Payplans Admin Panel and fill the correct information in App Parameters.
  • When customer makes the payment, he/she will be able to select this as a payment method.
  • There he/she can pay through his/her available Alpha user points or JomSocial Karma points.
113.teaser: Alpha User points and JomSocial can distribute or assign points to registered users according to some of its actions and activity on your website. PayPlans provides you the functionality of selling membership on the basis of these points.

114.title: Pay.nl
114.description:
What is Pay.nl ?

The Internet is a completely new market and has many unique characteristics. Still each and every company will have to deal with returns, growth and profits. If you would like to have a better hold on that, you have come to the right place. With our specialist knowledge in the field of online payment, we can add extra value to your business. With our many years of experience you are insured of quality, overview and a customer-oriented service.

Working of Pay.nl app?

Payment gateway for the payment service provider Pay.nl - This plugin allows you to use payment methods like 'iDEAL', 'Bancontact/Mistercash' and a lot more.

For Support Please Conatct Us At : support@pay.nl
114.teaser: Our Pay.nl app provides integration between PayPlans and Pay.nl. Through this app customers can pay with their Pay.nl account.
114.metadata: {"title":"Pay.nl with PayPlans","description":"Provides integration between PayPlans and Pay.nl. Payplans pay.nl plugin allows you to use payment methods like 'iDEAL', 'Bancontact\/Mistercash'.","keywords":"payplans,subsccription,software,system,pay.nl","robots":"","author":""}

115.title: PayFast
115.description:
PayFast is a payments processing service for South Africans and South African websites. PayFast  enable easy, secure and instant transfer of money between online buyers and sellers.

It allow sellers to accept payments from buyers in a variety of ways. We process credit cards (Visa and MasterCard), Instant EFT (bank transfers to any of SA's four biggest banks that get instantly verified) etc.

How it works :

  • Admin user is required to make an App in Payplans Admin Panel and fill the correct information in App Parameters.
  • When customer makes the payment, he/she will be redirected to PayFast's Site.
  • There he/she can pay through supported way of payment.

Currently it supports One Time Payment only.
115.teaser: PayFast is a payments processing service for South Africans and South African websites.
115.metadata: {"title":"Pay Fast App for Membership Websites","description":"","keywords":"Payfast, South African payment gateway","robots":"","author":""}

116.title: PayFlow
116.description:
Payflow payment gateway handles all major credit cards. What makes our gateway different is the low rates and incremental sales boost from offering PayPal and credit card payment options on your site.

Healthy benefits of Payflow

  • Help keep your costs down:- Take advantage of some of the lowest rates available today. With our hosted gateway, Payflow Link, there are no set-up or monthly fees. You simply pay a low 10-cent transaction fee on every sale.

  • Easily track every transaction:- Once you've set up your Payflow gateway, you can get back to running your business. Our PCI-compliant solution simplifies most of the work and cost of meeting regulatory requirements. And you can stay on top of every dollar with our online account management dashboard, PayPal Manager.

  • Boost sales by offering more ways to pay:- Buyers love the ease and security of PayPal, so offering the PayPal Express Checkout button on your site can have an immediate impact on sales.

What PayPlans support?

With PayPlans and Payflow, you are provided with following facilities:

  • Pay directly with your credit card
  • Easy payment method without getting redirected on PayPal’s website
  • Fixed amount Payment
  • Recurring Subscription
  • Cancel recurring order

How it works :

  • Admin user is required to make an App in Payplans Admin Panel and fill the correct information in App Parameters.
  • After completion of these details, the user can pay by using credit card.
116.teaser: Payflow payment gateway handles all major credit cards. What makes our gateway different is the low rates and incremental sales boost from offering PayPal and credit card payment options on your site.
116.metadata: {"title":"PayFlow App for Membership Websites","description":"","keywords":"payment, payflow, united-states. paflow pro paypal payment gateway","robots":"","author":""}

117.title: PayGate
117.description:
PayGate is a South Africa based leading online payment processor. It is a specialist credit card payment services provider. PayGate offer online, batch and point of sale payment services to help you get paid by your customers.

Currently it support only one time Payment.

How it works :

  • Admin user is required to make an App in Payplans Admin Panel and fill the correct information in App Parameters.
  • When customer makes the payment, he/she will be redirected to PayGate's Site.

117.teaser: This app allows you to accept payments via PayGate.
117.metadata: {"title":"PayGate","description":"Paygate is a specialist credit card payment services provider. Payplans paygate app allows you to accept payments via PayGate.","keywords":"Payplans,subsription,system,software,membership,Paygate,payment","robots":"","author":""}

118.title: PayPal
118.description:
PayPal is an American-based global e-commerce business allowing payments and money transfers to be made through the Internet. Online money transfers serve as electronic alternatives to paying with traditional paper methods, such as checks and money orders.

What we support :

  • Fixed amount Payment
  • Recurring Subscription
  • Trial Subscription
  • Payment through Paypal account as well as by credit card.
  • Payment will be on hold automatically when any refund is done via Paypal Merchant Account.

How it works :

  • Paypal app is pre-installed in previous versions of Payplans, from Payplans 3.3 you need to install it from App store.
  • Admin user is required to make an App in Payplans Admin Panel and fill the correct information in App Parameters.
  • When customer makes the payment, he/she will be redirected to Paypal's Site.
  • There he/she can pay through his/her Paypal account or by using credit card.

This is already installed with Payplans, you are not required to install any other plugin.
118.teaser: Our Paypal Payment App provides integration between Payplans and Paypal. Through this app customers can pay with their Paypal account or Credit Card.
118.metadata: {"title":"PayPal","description":"Our Paypal Payment App provides integration between Payplans and Paypal.","keywords":"payplans,membership,subscription,software,joomla,paypal","robots":"","author":""}

119.title: Paypal Payment Pro
119.description:
What is Paypal Pro (Website Payment Pro) ?
Website Payments Pro, is an online payment processing solution, is everything you need to securely accept credit cards and PayPal payments in one easy-to-manage account.

Key Benefits: Get all your payments processed quickly, simply, and affordably with our all-inclusive solution.

Lower Total Payment Processing Costs: On average, Website Payments Pro is up to 14% less expensive than other credit card processors. Pay nothing more than a low transaction fee and a $30 monthly fee.

Customers Stay on Your Site: Buyers paying by credit card never leave your site, so you control the entire payment experience.

One Account for Everything: No need to maintain separate relationships with a merchant account bank, a gateway, or credit card companies. PayPal handles all your payment processing as well as your reports, statements, billing information, and account support. It works with most major shopping carts, and since Virtual Terminal is included, it covers phone, fax, and email orders, too.

What PayPlans provide?

With PayPlans and Paypal Pro (Website payment pro), you are provided with following facilities:

  • Pay directly with your credit card
  • Online (Internet) route to pay for your money transactions
  • Easy payment method without getting redirected on PayPal’s website
  • Fixed amount Payment
  • Recurring Subscription
  • Trial Subscription
  • Trial with different time
  • Cancel recurring order
  • Payment will be on hold automatically when any refund is done via Paypal Merchant Account.

How it works :

  • Admin user is required to make an App in Payplans Admin Panel and fill the correct information in App Parameters.
  • After completion of these details, the user can pay by using credit card.
119.metadata: {"title":"Paypal Website Payment Pro","description":"Securely accept credit cards and PayPal payments in one easy-to-manage account.","keywords":"payplans,subscription,system,software,website payment pro","robots":"","author":""}

120.title: Payseal
120.description:
This gateway provide online banking solutions by support, payments through mastercard, visa and maestro cards. and it also support refunds.

we support :

  • This payment gateway support only fixed payments.
  • Payment amount should be at least one dollar.
  • Admin can refund any payment with just one click.
  • Admin can set prefilled buyer details and shipping details.
  • Generation of error logs when an error occurred while payment.
120.teaser: This gateway provide online banking solutions by support, payments through mastercard, visa and maestro cards. and it also support refunds.
120.metadata: {"title":"PayPlans | Payseal Payment Gateway","description":"PayPlans is now integrated with ICICI payment method payseal which provides a complete technology and banking solution for your business online payment requirements.","keywords":"'payplans integration with payseal', 'icici credit card processor', 'payseal online payment gateway'","robots":"","author":""}

121.title: Payza
121.description:
Payza(formerly known as alert AlertPay),is a global online payment platform specializing in ecommerce processing, corporate disbursements, and remittances for individuals and businesses around the world.

If you had an AlertPay account, you now have a Payza account! Use your old AlertPay username and password to login to your NEW Payza account – all of your information is the same!.

How PayPlans "Payza App" integrated with Payza Payment Gateway

  • Administrator is required to make an App in Payplans Admin Panel and required to fill the correct App Parameters.

  • When customer makes the payment, he/she will be redirected to Payza's Site.

  • There he/she can pay through his/her Payza's account.

  • Payza supports Fixed,Recurring and Recurring +trial 1 payment.
121.teaser: Payza(formerly known as alert AlertPay),is a global online payment platform specializing in ecommerce processing, corporate disbursements, and remittances for individuals and businesses around the world.
121.metadata: {"title":"Payza Payment Gateway App for Membership Websites","description":"","keywords":"Payza, AlertPay","robots":"","author":""}

122.title: PDF Invoice
122.description:
PDF Invoice App allows you to create printable payment bills both in front-end and back-end. It  facilitates administrators as well as front-end users to generate and download the invoices in PDF form.

After enabling the PDF invoice plugin, you will get:

  • A Reports tab in back-end, through which administrators get the facility to generate either one or bulk invoices at a time. Invoices are generated for either in between the given dates or for the given invoice key.  
  • A plugin parameter where the limit of invoices for bulk downloads can be set. It applies for the back-end only. It should be set as per the server capacity. (Recommended limit is 50)
  • An icon in front end on invoice and subscription display page, through which customers can download invoice in PDF format.
122.teaser: PDF Invoice App allows you to create and download printable payment bills in PDF form.
122.metadata: {"title":"PDF Invoice app for PayPlans","description":"Allows you to create and download printable payment bills in PDF form.","keywords":"Invoice,Payplans,pdf","robots":"","author":""}

123.title: Phoca Download
123.description:
What is Phoca Download

Phoca Download is a Joomla! component. It displays categories (subcategories) and files which can be downloaded from the site. Downloaded files are listed in Statistics View (administration). Files or categories can be commented or rated. Files (pdf, images) can be previewed, other files (flv,mp3) can be played in the browser. File can be stored in external server. Phoca Download include ACL which means, files or categories can be accessed only for specific groups or users.

How PayPlans "Phoca Download App" integrate with Phoca Download Component

Administrator can use this app if he wants to assign "Access Rights" and "Upload Rights" of categories automatically to a user after subscribing a plan.
Administrator can decide what type of "Access Rights" and "Upload Rights" of categories will be assigned to user for subscription status active, hold and expire.

Administrator can create different apps for each plan if he require to assign different "Access Rights" and "Upload Rights" of categories according to plan.
123.teaser: Our Phoca Download plugin provides integration of Phoca Download with PayPlans.

124.title: Pin
124.description:
The Pin Payments API allows you to seamlessly integrate payment processing into your website. Pin Payments gives you the everything you need to accept card payments from your customers while you retain complete control over the purchase experience. Get paid without forcing your customer to leave your website or application; less friction, more conversions.

This app supports following plans Types:

  • Fixed
  • Recurring
  • Recurring + Trial 1
  • Recurring + Trial 2
124.teaser: A very unique feature of PIN payment gateway is that administrators do not need to setup merchant account. When your customers make a payment, funds are transferred to your existing bank account.

125.title: Plan Dynamic Modifier
125.description:
Plan dynamic modifier is used to change plan at the time of subscription.

By using this you can avail plan as dynamic plan which can be converted into a different plan with options available. Now you can allow a same plan in different prices for different time.
125.teaser: Plan dynamic modifier is used to change plan at the time of subscription.
125.metadata: {"title":"Plan Dynamic Modifier","description":"Using this app you can dynamically change the price & time of plan during the time of subscription","keywords":"\"Plan Dynamic Modifier\", \"PayPlans\", \"Joomla open source membership software\", \"modify plan dynamically\", \"appville\", \"app-manager\"","robots":"","author":""}

126.title: Post Affiliate Pro
126.description:
What is Post Affiliate Pro?

Post Affiliate Pro is intuitive, fast, effective, and infinitely expandable affiliate software, it will grow with you. It is a great tool to recruit and manage your affiliates. It will track your affiliate's referrals, clicks, commissions, record payouts, and much more.

How PayPlans "Post Affiliate Pro App" integrate with Post Affiliate Pro?

Using this app administrator can track clicks and sales at his site.

This app can be used by administrator to integrate his affiliate program with PayPlans.

Administrator has to create affiliate setup at his Post-Affiliate Pro account and then required to fill certain parameters into PayPlans App for integration.
126.teaser: Our Post-Affiliate Pro App provides integration of Post-Affiliate Pro with Payplans.
126.metadata: {"title":"Post Affiliate Pro","description":"Provides integration of Post-Affiliate Pro with Payplans.","keywords":"post-affiliate,payplans,subscription,system,software","robots":"","author":""}

128.title: Pro Discount
128.description:
Earlier when you created different discount apps, they took considerable time to complete their task, but this new plugin provided with PayPlans 2.1 will decrease event triggers and speedup the discounting tasks.

  • If you are using 10 or more discounts, then we recommend that you use this discount plugin. Disable all the discount apps and set the discount value in this plugin.
  • Also, you can enable/disable allowed multiple discount codes on single invoice, from the configuration tab available at the back-end.
  • Administrators can also give direct discounts from back-end itself. If you give xx.yy% discount then percentage discount will be applied. Else, xx.yy amount (according to currency) will be applied as discount.

Note: This app is compatible with PayPlans 2.1 and higher versions only. It doesn't support PayPlans 1.x series and PayPlans 2.0.
128.teaser: Earlier when you created different discount apps, they took considerable time to complete their task, but this new plugin provided with PayPlans 2.1 will decrease event triggers and speedup the discounting tasks.

129.title: Quick Registration
129.description:
If you don't want the lengthy process of registration on your site, then you must use Payplans'  Quick Registration Plug-in. If this plugin is enabled, user can register at your site within few seconds. So no need to use default Joomla Registration or any other registration system.

How it works :-

  • This plugin should be selected in Configuration of Payplans.
  • When user subscribe the plans, he/she is asked for registration or login.
  • He/she is asked for Username, Email and their own password.
  • After registration they will get activation or confirmation mail or both depending on the parameter values of plugin.

Note : Activate After Payment functionality added from PayPlans 3.3.
129.teaser: Quick Registration Plugin is a plugin which allows users to register on our site in few seconds.
129.metadata: {"title":"","description":"Quick Registration Plugin is a plugin which allows users to register on our site in few seconds.","keywords":"'activate after payment', 'payplans', 'registration', 'open source', 'membership software'","robots":"","author":""}

130.title: QuickPay
130.description:
QuickPay is a Danish Payment Gateway which works with all common credit and debit cards. It is the payment solution that allows easy and safe money transfers to be made through the Internet by credit-/debit cards.

What Payplans provide?

  • Fixed amount Payment
  • Recurring payments
  • Recurring with Trial payments
  • Trial with different time
  • Cancel recurring payment

How it works :

  • Admin user is required to make an App in Payplans Admin Panel and fill the correct information in App Parameters.
  • When customers check-out the invoice, for fixed payments they will be redirected to QuickPay's Site where they can pay by using their credit-/debit card.
  • And in case of recurring subscription they are required to fill-up the credit card credentials on the site itself.
130.teaser: Our QuickPay Plugin provides integration of QuickPay with PayPlans.

131.title: Renewal
131.description: Using renewal plugin admin can provide option to site users that they can renew their existing plan before and after expiration of their subscription.
131.teaser: Renewal plugin will be used to renew existing subscribed plan.

132.title: RokFeature Table
132.description: Creating a template for RokFeatureTable Module is just a click away. Just install our RokFeatureTable Plugin, it will automatically create a template. If you have modified plan's data, then you can update template by clicking on a link provided in this plugin.
132.teaser: RokFeatureTable is template integrated module which is perfect for plan comparisons. It is stylish & user friendly.
132.metadata: {"title":"RokFeature table-compare your plans","description":"Template integrated module which is perfect for plan comparisons. ","keywords":"payplans,,Software for membership,joomla","robots":"","author":""}

133.title: Sage Pay
133.description:
Sage Pay is Europe’s leading independent payment service provider (PSP) and is one of the most trusted payment brands.Sage Pay payment gateway allows businesses to accept debit and credit card payment and provide payment security and fraud prevention.


Note :

  1. Sage Pay payment gateway Support Fixed,Recurring, Recurring+1 and Recurring+2 trial.
  2. PayPlans Sage Pay payment gateway integration doesn’t support refund request.
  3. 25+ currencies supported. By default, the Terminal will select GBP as the transaction currency. If you have multi-currency setup on your Sage Pay account you can use this option to choose which currency is selected by default.
  4. In PayPlans Sage Pay payment gateway integration we supports credit/debit card (Visa, Master Card, American Express, Diner's Club) as payment method.
133.teaser: Sage Pay is an online payment gateway allows businesses to accept debit and credit card payments securely from customers.
133.metadata: {"title":"Sage Pay Payment Gateway","description":"Sage Pay is an online payment gateway allows businesses to accept debit and credit card payments securely from customers.","keywords":"","robots":"","author":""}

134.title: Setcom and SID
134.description:
Setcom enables individuals and businesses in 200 countries and territories around the world to securely send and receive payments.

Currently two ways are supported.

  1. SID is an Instant EFT payment service that allows customers to pay an online merchant directly from their bank account via their Internet banking facility. A credit card is not required!
  2. Setcom is the leading online credit card payment processor in South Africa. Businesses such as Mango Airlines, Interflora and Independent Newspapers, count on us to provide a 24/7 enterprise-class infrastructure.

What we support :-

  • One time Payment
  • Payment through credit card.
  • Payment through bank account.

Note: This payment gateway application hasn't been tested for PayPlans 2.0. So, if you use it, then test it yourself and if any problem appears, then let us know about it. We will solve it at highest priority.
134.teaser: Setcom Payment App integrates Paypans to Setcom Payment gateway. Payment can be completed by Instant EFT (SID) and Credit Card (Setcom).

136.title: Skip Free Invoice
136.description:
This plugin can be used to skip invoice-confirm page while subscribing FREE plans which are:

  • Fixed or,
  • Forever

Thus, your customers will not be taken for invoice-confirm page instead, they will be directly taken to 'Thanks for your subscription' page.

Note: This app is not applicable for recurring and other paid subscriptions
136.metadata: {"title":"skip Invoice","description":"With this you can choose to skip the invoice confirm page.","keywords":"Invvoice,payplans,subscription,system","robots":"","author":""}

138.title: Sobi2
138.description:
Sigsiu Online Business Index 2 (also known as Sobi2) is an open source web directory component and content construction kit (CCK) for the Joomla CMS.

Sobi2 is an add-on to Joomla that makes it possible to run and manage a directory in a website.

PayPlans-Sobi2  plugin  allows to control the number of entries a user can submit. You can also control out of submitted entries how much entries can be published.
138.teaser: Our Sobi2 plugin provides integration of Sobi2 with PayPlans.

139.title: SobiPro
139.description:
SobiPro is a powerful directory extension for the Joomla! Content Management System that is designed to easily create multiple directories or content types. SobiPro will allow you and your site visitors to submit, search, filter and view custom content on your Joomla! powered website with ease. SobiPro allows you to create a functional directory that lets your website visitors submit entries from the front-end.

PayPlans Integration with SobiPro controls the number of entries a user can submit depending upon their subscription plans.
139.teaser: SobiPro plugin controls the number of entries in SobiPro Sections.

140.title: Social Discount
140.description:
1. Provide discount(s) to your customers, on every product's purchase.
2. Gain attention of more and more customers by popularizing your product (s)

Popularity can be gained by giving discounts to your customers only when they share your product on social networking websites like Facebook, Twitter and Google Plus. Doing so, will not only spread your product's existence among the millions of users on social networking websites, but also increase the probablity of your product's purchase.

RESULTS:
1.Increase in number of sales increases
2.Hike in revenue
3.Customer reach increases
4.Your product becomes popular
140.teaser: Give discount to your customers for Facebook Like, Tweet & G+.

141.title: Stripe
141.description:
Stripe payment gateway app allows you to integrate PayPlans to offer online payment solution.

Features :

  • Stripe Payment gateway now supports Free trials with Recurring.
  • Stripe app supports payment for :
    • Fixed Plan.
    • Recurring Plan.
    • Recurring +Trial Plan (Free trials).
  • Notification Time : Instant.
  • This payment gateway app supports refund.

Working :

  • Admin needs to install app and create it's app instance and fill necessary details.
  • For payment processing, user needs to fill card details on merchant's site. No needs to redirect on Payment Gateway site.
141.teaser: Stripe payment gateway app allows you to integrate PayPlans to offer online payment solution.
141.metadata: {"title":"PayPlans | Stripe Payment Gateway","description":"PayPlans is now integrated with stripe payment gateway. stipe handles everything, including storing cards, subscriptions, and direct payouts to your bank account.","keywords":"'payplans integration with stripe', 'online payment solution', 'open source method'","robots":"","author":""}

142.title: Subscription Approval
142.description:
Subscription Approval App integrated with PayPlans, used to stop the automatic activation of subscription.

Features :

  • This app will consider only those subscriptions, in which payment has completed and invoice is paid.
  • Admin will be able to activate the subscription from back-end, thats why named subscription approval app.
  • Till then users subscription status will be on hold and Invoice is paid.

Working :

  • Admin needs to install app and create it's app instance and fill necessary details.
  • Admin can write custom content or can use already written Joomla articles as email content for user.
  • Admin can set the option to send email to subscriber as well as to other users, if needed.
  • After user subscribes plan, subscription status will be hold, until admin manually activates.
142.teaser: Approval App can be used to stop the automatic activation of subscription. Only Admin user(s) will be able to activate the subscription from back-end.
142.metadata: {"title":"Subscription Approval App for Membership Websites","description":"","keywords":"approval, subscription-activation, administrator","robots":"","author":""}

143.title: Subscription Detail
143.description:
Subscription Detail app used to get some additional subscription details from user at the time of plan subscription.

Features :

  • To allow customers to add different domain for each subscription and mention that details.
  • Subscription details which customer fill at the time of subscription will be saved with respected subscription.
  • Admin can use the default fields provided with app, in Setup Instructions at app instance screen.
  • Default fields provided with app do not force user to fill it necessarily.

Working :

  • Admin needs to install app then create it's app instance and fill necessary details.
  • To apply jQuery validations and classes which you want to include by with this app, you can refer jQuery Validation Doc.
  • When user subscribes a plan then he needs to fill subscription details at Invoice-Checkout screen and proceed further.
143.teaser: This app can be used to get some additional details with each subscription, from the customers.
143.metadata: {"title":"Subscription Detail App for Membership Websites","description":"","keywords":"additonal details, subscription, frontend access, user details","robots":"","author":""}

144.title: Terms of Service
144.description: This app forces the user to follow the certain terms and conditions to subscribe a plan. if the user doesn't follow the them, then the user won't be allowed to checkout for the subscription of the plan.
144.teaser: Terms of Service app forces user to agree terms and conditions.

146.title: Tienda
146.description:
What is Tienda

Tienda is a complete ecommerce extension for Joomla. Tienda is not a fork or bridge; it is a brand new extension designed and written from scratch on Joomla's MVC framework and can therefore be easily modified or themed using Joomla's templates.

Tienda has been built with you, the site's administrator, in mind.  While building Tienda, we focused on answering the question, "What would make it easier for us to operate our online stores?"  Tienda is the result. Two versions will be available, Community and Enterprise.

How PayPlans "Tienda App" integrate with Tienda Component

Administrator can use this app if he wants to assign a particular "User's Group" automatically to a user after subscribing a plan.
Administrator can decide which "User's Group" will be assigned to user for subscription status active, hold and expire.
146.teaser: Our Tienda plugin provides integration of Tienda with PayPlans.

147.title: Upgrade
147.description:
Upgrade app Plugin is used to switch from current plan to another plan.

Features of upgrade application:-

  • User does not required to pay complete price of the new plan, the amount remaining in his previous subscription will be transferred directly to his new subscription. 
  • User does not require to subscribe two plans, he can directly upgrade his plan after subscribing one plan.

Note :- In case of upgrade application, a user cannot down-grade his plan.
147.teaser: Upgrade app Plugin is used to switch from current plan to another plan.
147.metadata: {"title":"Upgrade","description":"Upgrade app Plugin is used to switch from current plan to another plan.","keywords":"Upgrade,payplans,membership,subscription,software,joomla","robots":"","author":""}

148.title: Used Time Monitor
148.description:
Used-Time-Monitor is an app, which is used to provide access to the subscribers  for some particular time period within the expiration time of plan. The time that will be allocated to the subscribers, will be utilized  as per their use. After completion of the allocated time, their subscription will be expired, irrespective of the expiration time of their subscription.

For example: If you want that by subscribing a plan( Let say, 1 month), subscribers will get 10 hours of access to your site, within the expiration time of subscription (In this case, 1 month). These 10 hours will be utilized by the subscribers in many slots as per their need. When the allocated time is fully utilized, their subscription will be marked as expired.

How it works:

  • Admin can set the parameter ‘When to considered session as expired’  in the plugin.
  • A new screen ‘Time Monitor’ will be added after enabling the plugin. This screen shows the tracking and monitoring of actions performed by the users.
  • Create an app in Payplans Admin Panel and fill the required fields in App parameters.
  • Create a  dashboard widget for used-time-monitor, so that front user can also see their usage.
148.teaser: Used-Time-Monitor is an app, which is used to provide access to the subscribers  for some particular time period within the expiration time of plan.
148.metadata: {"title":"Used Time Monitor App for Membership Websites","description":"","keywords":"Time Monitoring, Track Activity, Track Visits","robots":"","author":""}

149.title: User Detail
149.description:
User-detail app is used to show additional details of the user. Using this app administrator can ask additional details from user.

To apply validations and classes on the parameters which you include by using this app, you can refer this document.

Features :-

  • Integration with this app will made easy to maintain additional informations of customers.
  • Administrator do not require to create any other form for additional user-details.
  • It's become easy for customers to add and update details.
  • There are two options to attach this app with plan, admin can use either of them :-
  1. Administrator can make this app as core app which implies that this app will be attached with all the available plans.
  2. Administrator can make different apps for each plans if he want different user-details respective to each plan.
149.teaser: User-detail app is used to show additional details of the user. Using this app administrator can ask additional details from user.

150.title: User Preferences
150.description:
Using User Preferences App, a user can submit his/her preferences such as, Business Name, Shipping Address, Business Address.

After creating this App, you have to create an DashBoard Widget for this App. Then the app will show the user preferences on the front-end.
150.teaser: This App allow user to submit his preferences through Payplans DashBoard Widget.
150.metadata: {"title":"User Preferences","description":"Allows user to submit his preferences through Payplans DashBoard Widget.","keywords":"Payplans,subsription,system,software,membership","robots":"","author":""}

152.title: VirtueMart
152.description:
What is VirtueMart

VirtueMart is a PHP-based Shopping Cart Application for selling goods over the internet. It's a Component for a Content Management System called Joomla! (and Mambo) and can't be used without Joomla!. It installs fairly easy using the automatic Component and Module Installer. It's intended for use in small / mid-sized Online Businesses / Online-Shops. So every user who wants to build up a Online Store can use this Component for selling something to Customers.

How PayPlans "VirtueMart App" integrate with VirtueMart Component

Administrator can use this app if he wants to assign a particular "Shopper's Group" automatically to a user after subscribing a plan.
Administrator can decide which "Shopper's Group" will be assigned to user for subscription status active, hold and expire.

Administrator can create different apps for each plan if he require to assign different Shopper's Groups according to plan.
152.teaser: Our VirtueMart plugin provides integration of VirtueMart Shopping Cart with PayPlans.

153.title: Zoo
153.description:
Zoo is a flexible and powerful content application builder to manage your content. The key feature is the ability to create your very own custom content types.

Payplans App for Zoo provide access on the visibility and accessibility of zoo category. You can apply restriction either on viewing a category or on submitting an item in a category or on both.

Through viewing you can control which categories a user can view.

Through submission you can control how many items a user can submit in a particular zoo category.
153.teaser: Zoo app can be used to control access to Zoo Category on the basis of user's subscription status.
153.metadata: {"title":"Zoo app by PayPlans","description":"Used to control access to Zoo Category on the basis of user's subscription status.","keywords":"payplans.subscription,software,system,zoo","robots":"","author":""}

154.title: Zoo Element
154.description:
It provides you the functionality to restrict the accessibility of zoo elements for your front end users. Such restrictions can be applied according to the plan(s) subscribed by the users. It is a plugin which can be installed from the extension manager. You are required to enable the plugin before starting the proper use of this feature.

For example, if you wish to restrict the accessibility of a certain image according to the plan subscribed by the user. Then, this plugin can be used to apply the restrictions on the image. When a customer subscribes the plan, the restricted image will become visible to the subscriber.
154.teaser: It provides you the functionality to restrict the accessibility of zoo elements for your front end users. Such restrictions can be applied according to the plan(s) subscribed by the users.
154.metadata: {"title":"Zoo Element","description":"A PayPlans access control app to control access on zoo elements according to subscribed membership plans","keywords":"PayPlans,Yootheme,Zoo,Access Control,Membership, Management,Software,AppVille","robots":"","author":"PayPlans"}

156.title: Referral
156.description:
Simply stating it will be a mini affiliate app. In which your subscribers will get certain discount (as per your choice), if the subscriber refers your site’s subscription to few of his friends and it leads to an actual financial conversion.

Its a core Payplans app. In which Referral user get discount code through mail automatically while referred user will get benefit as a discount during subscription checkout process.Referral code will be available to applicable plans as selected in app.

Note : We have made some changes in the latest version of app. Please refer document for further details.
156.teaser: Referral App provides benefits to referral and referred users. Simply stating it's a mini affiliate app of PayPlans.
156.metadata: {"keywords":"Payplans,subsription,system,software,membership,Referral, referred user ","description":"Referral App provides benefits to referral and referred users. Simply stating it's a mini affiliate app of PayPlans."}

179.title: Gift App
179.description:
Gift App allows you to gift your favorite subscription to your friends, family, employee etc.

Features :

  • Purchase subscriptions for you and gift subscriptions for family and friends.
  • Admin and user both gets email for gift purchase.
  • Admin can limit the number of gift codes that can be purchased in one shot.
  • Works only with fixed plans.
  • Refunds for gift purchase is not allowed. If you want to refund, process each gift subscription manually.

Working :

  • This app doesn't work without prodiscount app. So, install Pro Discount App then install Gift app.
  • Now, users can purchase gift subscriptions from frontend.
  • Just after completing purchase, user will get an email with gift codes.
  • Admin will also get an email with the user information who has purchased gift codes.
  • Admin can check gift codes at Discounts tab in PayPlans backend screen.
  • Users can apply the gift codes and can get 100% discounts.
179.teaser: Gift App allows you to gift your favorite subscription to your friends, family, employee etc.
179.metadata: {"keywords":"gift, subscriptions ","description":"Gift App allows you to gift your favorite subscription to your friends, family, employee etc."}

180.title: Payline
180.description:
PayLine payment gateway app integrated with PayPlans is a French payment gateway.

Features :

  • PayLine app supports payment for : Fixed Plan and Recurring Plans.
  • Support for 1 trial, 2 trial and free trial.
  • Notification Time : Instant.
  • Supported Currencies :
    • Euro, US Dollar, France Suisse, Sterling, Canadian Dollar.
  • Minimum Payment Amount : 0.50 in each currency.
  • Supported Cards : Credit Card.

Working :

202.title: Subscription Start Date
202.description:
This app will empower the admins to set the subscription start date of their users for a future use, not just activate instantly after receiving the payment.

Features

  • App will consider only those subscriptions which have completed payment or Invoice-Paid.
  • After subscribing, subscription will remain in No-Status till Start Subscription Date.
  • Subscription will get activated on start on date automatically on cron.

Note :

  • This will work for fixed payments only.
  • This app will not work with Subscription Approval app.
  • Subscription Start Date app does not work with Renewal and Upgrade apps.
  • Out of range subscriptions will not be affected and will activates normally.
